name: Devwill Too Prologue
description:
Devwill Too Prologue is a small platform game with a Combo System.

I was made in 1 week to learn the basics on Multimedia Fusion.

Original Graphics and sounds by myself.

Suport USB joypads

For windows only.

Controls:

Enter or any Joy button: start

X or any joy button: Jump

F3 for windowed Mode

F4 for Full screen mode.

Enjoy.
